BR.name: Family Tennis 3D
BR.description: A série Family chega ao Nintendo 3DS com um jogo casual de tênis! Novos personagens entram em cena, elevando o número para oito, existindo ainda seis campos diferentes e repletos de variedade. Com a adição do Modo Fácil, qualquer um pode jogar com um simples aperto de um botão e divertir-se com a brincadeira. Comece com o modo Torneio e desbloqueie todos os itens da galeria, então por que não experimentar os minijogos: Roulette Rally, Human Backboard, e o Survivor? Jogue em dupla e faça desse jogo um show de realidade!

CA.name: Family Tennis 3D
CA.description: The Family series comes to Nintendo 3DS with a casual tennis game! New characters join in to bring the number of playable characters to eight and there are six different courts, all exploding with variety. With the addition of Easy Mode, absolutely anyone can play with the press of a button and look great while doing it. Start with the Tournament to unlock everything in the gallery, then why not try the minigames: Roulette Rally, Human Backboard, and Survivor? Play some doubles and make it a real show!

MX.name: Family Tennis 3D
MX.description: ¡Juego familiar para Nintedo 3DS! ¡Cualquier puede jugar gracias a sus sencillos controles! ¡Disfruta al máximo con estos divertidos personajes y libertad absoluta de juego! ¡La serie de juegos familiares llega a Nintendo 3DS con este juego de tenis! Ocho personajes para elegir y seis diferentes pistas en las que jugar, todas ellas súper emocionantes. Gracias al Modo Fácil, cualquiera puede jugar usando tan solo un botón. Empieza por el Torneo y desbloquea toda la galería. Luego, puedes probar con los Minijuegos: Peloteo, Soporte Humano y Superviviente.

US.description: The Family series comes to Nintendo 3DS with a casual tennis game! New characters join in to bring the number of playable characters to eight and there are six different courts, all exploding with variety. With the addition of Easy Mode, absolutely anyone can play with the press of a button and look great while doing it. Start with the Tournament to unlock everything in the gallery, then why not try the minigames: Roulette Rally, Human Backboard, and Survivor? Play some doubles and make it a real show!
